hero.name: Rodion
hero.description: I develop visuals, user interfaces and web applications
hero.traits: • Purposeful • Persevering • Attentive • Stress-resistant • Sociable • Disciplined

about.description: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in TypeScript and JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js. I'm a quick learner to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

experienceHeader.subtitle: What I have done so far
experienceHeader.title: Technical Experience.

experience.title: Faculty of Information Technology
points: Completed comprehensive training in programming and software development.
Learned the fundamentals of algorithms, data structures, OOP, and modern programming languages.
Developed academic projects ranging from simple scripts to full web applications with both client and server functionality.
Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic backend development.
Participated in team projects: task planning, and collaborative development.

experience.title: Internships & Courses
points: Completed courses on JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern frontend development.
Gained practical experience building applications with React, Redux, and React Query.
Learned Git basics, code review practices, and team workflow.
Participated in internships and practical projects focused on creating UI components and optimizing application performance.
Developed an understanding of best practices: clean code, reusable components, error handling, and scalable architecture.

experience.title: Compulsory Military Service
points: Completed military service, developed discipline, responsibility, and stress-resistance.
Improved communication skills and the ability to work in a team under pressure.
Continued studying frontend development during free time when possible.

experience.title: Modern Web Development
points: Creating different web applications: landing pages, dashboards, game demos, and real-world interfaces.
Working with React, TypeScript, Tailwind, Three.js, and modern frontend tooling.
Building full-stack applications with Node.js, Express, SQLite/PostgreSQL.
Developing pet-projects: game prototypes, Telegram/Adsgram integrations, TON wallet apps.
Improving code quality using clean architecture principles.
Constantly learning new technologies and improving skills to grow into a top-tier frontend developer.

worksHeader.subtitle: My work
worksHeader.title: Projects.
worksHeader.description: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

works.subtitle: My work
works.title: Projects.
works.description: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

projects.name: Collection App
projects.description: Full-stack app with client, server, and database for managing a personal collection: adding/editing/viewing items.

projects.name: Maps App
projects.description: Web application for working with geodata: viewing maps, adding and editing markers, tracking locations, and interacting with the map in real time.

projects.name: ToDo App
projects.description: Simple and user-friendly React web application for task management: adding, deleting, marking as completed, and editing tasks.
